heading: How it works
info:
Track expenses, income, and create savings plan while growing your funds
conviniently. Do these things plus more in a non-custodial wallet. Youâ€™re in control.

list.heading: Powerful suite of tools
list.info: DeFi solutions are often complex, unintuitive, and hard to understand. Thrift makes it simple, providing real solutions to real life finance problems.

items.heading: Non-custodial Savings
items.info: Own your data, save your funds in the safest way, earn passively, get rewards, NFTs and much more.

items.heading: Crowd Lending
items.info: Join or create groups according to your saving goals, lend, and grow your wealth.

items.heading: Multiple Payments
items.info: For a single payment transaction fee, you can make multiple payments in one transaction.
